messagebundle.msg: Qibla Direction
View the prayer direction to the Qibla. In Islam, a Muslim faces the Kaaba in Makkah (Mecca) at the time of prayer (Salah).
Default map location. E.g. "USA", "New York City, USA", "29 Fifth Avenue, New York City, USA".
Default map zoom level. Enter a value appropriate to the default map location. E.g. 5 for a country, 12 for a city, and 19 for a full address.
Default country for searching addresses. E.g. us, uk, my, pk.
Information message background color.
Information message foreground color.
Enter your address here
Show direction to the Qibla
The location that you are praying from
The address cannot be found due to an error.
The address is empty.
The address is unknown. It may be relatively new.
The address cannot be found due to legal reasons.
The API key is invalid.
The address searching limit has been reached.
Help
Type your address into the box above the map, then press the Enter key
The cross hairs in the center of the map show where you are praying from. To adjust the map, use one of the following methods:
Click the up/down/left/right buttons in the top left corner of the map (not available on small maps)
Click on the map and drag it with the mouse button pressed
Press the up/down/left/right arrow keys on your keyboard

The red line shows the direction to the Qibla. To visualize the direction better, click the Satellite button in the top right corner of the map. To zoom in for more detail, use one of the following methods:
Click the +/- buttons in the top left corner of the map
Press the +/- keys on your keyboard
Double-click the map
Rotate the mouse wheel button
Add "Qibla Direction" to your website
